shows.title: The Kessler Effect & Mars / Finding Amelia Earhart
shows.first_half: First Half: Author, retired firefighter, and Coast Guard Captain Christopher Lee Jones will discuss all things Mars, as well as the Kessler Effect (the accumulation of space debris in low-earth orbit), its implications, and how we can survive it.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and filmmaker Richard Martini will bring us his latest research into Amelia Earhart's disappearance. He'll share how many aspects of Earhart's life have been covered up, and how his 35 years of research and interviews have led him to believe that she was never lost.

shows.title: Exploring Past Lives / How to Grow Spiritually
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and researcher Joanne DiMaggio will bring us her work in the field of reincarnation. She'll address the most commonly asked questions, such as what is an old soul, what do soulmates mean, and how is the unfinished business from a prior life playing out in this one?
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and spiritual teacher Austyn Wells will discuss different belief foundations, the spiritual tools and practices we use, and how to navigate grief and death. She'll also provide tips for spiritual development, showing us how we can discover our life's purpose.

shows.title: Mysterious Kings & Gods / Remote Viewing & UFOs
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and spiritual leader Jonathan Cahn will discuss ancient mysteries related to kings and our modern American leaders, as well as the ancient template that lies behind what's happening in America. He'll also talk about the mystery of ancient priesthoods and how they influence current events.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and remote viewer Paul Smith will share his research on the connection between remote viewing and UFOs. He'll explore the public's renewed excitement around the existence of ET life, and will also discuss the legendary Dr. Hal Puthoff's handwritten notes detailing four well hidden, long-established UFO bases here on planet Earth.

shows.title: Discovering Spiritual Truth / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Rich Berra (email) welcomes Darius Wright, a teacher, philosopher, and leading voice on out-of-body experiences, to discuss the illusion of time. Wright will also expose how media and culture suppress spiritual truth, preventing people from rising above the matrix of control. He'll argue that in a world at war with consciousness, this kind of truth isn't just powerful—it's necessary. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Rich a call and discuss whatever's on your mind!
